description: --- language: - it tags: - seq2seq license: mit --- # Italian Contextual Spellchecker The model is a fine-tuned version of [IT5](https://huggingface.co/models?search=it5)[1], specifically modelled for computing a spellchecking in the shape of a sequence-to-sequence task. ### USAGE The input sequence should have the structure seq: your text.. Missing the seq token at the beginning or the final punctuation mark may lead to bad performances.
